name: Sideshow Showdown
description:
Sideshow Showdown is a big top 2D twin stick shooter. You take control of Sam, a young child who must save their family from the creepy carnie “Upton O’Goode” who has turned them into prizes for his sideshow alley game. The only way to save your family? Survive Sideshow Showdown and out-wit Upton O'Goode.  

This is not an ordinary sideshow alley game, this time the stakes are higher the fate of your beloved family hangs in the balance! Use a trusty hammer to smash your foes to earn tickets, which you can spend on prizes from Uptons’ store to increase your capacity for mayhem against an ever increasingly difficult horde of enemies.

Unlock 3 wacky weapons to help you bring the fight to Upton and his horde of enemies. Turn the arena against your enemies by turning Uptons’ traps into your own. Save you family members so they can help you survive the twisted tent of Sideshow Showdown & unlock the the ultimate prize, the glorious golden teddy!

...The Showdown awaits.

Sideshow Showdown was made as a capstone project at SAE Qantum
